TopicTitle: Does anyone have 3D models of both male and female Kerbals?

Articles.Content: I am making a reddit banner, and I would appreciate it if someone had rigged models of male and female kerbals, preferably Blender models please. Thanks in advance if anyone does have one.

Here is a male rigged model.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95782-Rigged-Kerbal-3D-Model

You could tweak it a bit to get the female look.
